column5: I saw this online and thought it was kind of cool and would pass it on to you fine OFC'ers~!   http://www.costco.com/Browse/Product.aspx?...p=C&topnav=

Hmmm thats not bad, dont need another rod, but I like the backpack idea. Right know I've got one of those tackle bags with the shoulder strap, but on long walks its killer on my sholder. Thanks for the post, now I have an excuse to go out.
thats very interesting,thats a good idea for shore fisherman
Yep...looks awesome! I'll have to look into that!
